DOC.brief_title: Study Analyze Effects EBI OsteoGen™ Surgical Reconstruction Tibia Non-unions
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical outcome collection study analyze effect EBI OsteoGen™ Direct Current Stimulator upon surgical reconstruction tibia nonunion ( visible progressive sign heal ) fracture prospective database .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis tibia nonunion . 2 . Male female age 18 75 year old , inclusive 1 . Subject open wound underlie osteomyelitis . 2 . Subject associate multiple trauma , and/or fracture anatomically reduce lose reduction later time point . 3 . If female , subject pregnant , plan become pregnant duration clinical outcome collection study lactate . 4 . Subject implanted unipolar pacemaker . 5 . Subject active cancer . 6 . Subject severe peripheral vascular disease ( ABI < 0.4 )
